InstructionData.Title: DoorControlProxy
InstructionData.Author: Orpheus2468
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias Door1 d0 alias Sensor1a d1 alias Sensor1b d2 alias Door2 d3 alias Sensor2a d4 alias Sensor2b d5
alias VKE r0 alias SensorA r1 alias SensorB r2
Main: bdns Door1 NextDoor l SensorA Sensor1a Activate l SensorB Sensor1b Activate or VKE SensorA SensorB s Door1 Open VKE
NextDoor: bdns Door2 Main l SensorA Sensor2a Activate l SensorB Sensor2b Activate or VKE SensorA SensorB s Door2 Open VKE
j Main
